price: Allí emitirán alaridos [por el tormento], y por eso no podrán oír nada más.
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā zafīrun wahum fīhā lā yasmaʿūna
